data: “And to think,” Charlie Carton exclaimed, “that they pay you a city editor’s salary for ideas like that!”
"And to think," Charlie Carton exclaimed, "that they pay you a city editor's salary for ideas like that!"
Hamilton, Edmond, 1904-1977; Paul, Frank R. (Frank Rudolph), 1884-1963 [Illustrator]; Ruger, John [Illustrator]
